message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer.  I'm interested, but $14,000 is too high for me. Would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective, $8,000 is significantly below its value. Could you do $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my range. I could go up to $9,000, but that's my absolute limit.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?  This is my final offer.
